title: 【灵活移动】这个怎么安装？
author: yes1998go
txt_content:
QQ截图20130316233727.png (74.96 KB, 下载次数: 3)

下载附件

2013-3-16 23:33 上传




我去官网下载的13.1版本，不像论坛里面的直接丢MODS就有用，不会安装，求详细点。这是关于这一个MOD的一段话The client standalone package "Smart Moving Client Standalone Minecraft-ayh-ayo-iq-iv.zip" overwrites the files "net/minecraft/client/Minecraft.class", "ayh", "ayo.class" "iq".class and iv.class. The client standalone package "Smart Moving Client Standalone ast-ayh-bag-iq-iv.zip" overwrites the files "ast.class", "ayh", "bag.class", iq.class and iv.class.    基础MOD安装完毕....

replies.author: a1257506573
replies.txt_content: 最好是下载那个帖子里自带的API

replies.author: zq549597479
replies.txt_content:
1.需要安装player api
2.把客户端灵活动作mod放到mods文件夹

replies.author: a377378886
replies.txt_content: 那就话就是叫你装那个包
